title: Add useMemo to context provider values
description: 5 of 6 contexts create new value objects on every render, causing cascade re-renders. Add useMemo to SessionContext, FolderContext, PreferencesContext, TrashContext, and SplitContext provider values.
close_reason: Added useMemo to 5 context providers and fixed SplitContext unstable dependency

title: Extract duplicate Sidebar rendering logic
description: Extract renderSessionsWithSplits helper to eliminate 120 lines of duplication between folder and root session rendering.
close_reason: Extracted renderSessionsWithSplits helper, consolidated ~120 lines of duplicate IIFE blocks

title: Remove dead code from contexts
description: Remove unused: activePanes/setActivePaneInSplit from SplitContext, getFolderStats from GitHubStatsContext, unused error/loading states from multiple contexts.
close_reason: Removed dead code: getFolderStats/folderStatsCache from contexts, recoverSessions/cleanupOrphanedTmuxSessions from session-service, cleanupExpiredCaches from cache-service, getFolderStats from github-stats-service

title: Prevent terminal WS reconnect after unmount/close
description: Terminal reconnects on ws.onclose even during unmount, causing ghost reconnect loops. Add unmount/intentional close guard. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Sidebar session menu should not auto-create sessions
description: Dropdown trigger currently fires quick session creation when opening the menu. Separate quick action from menu open. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Handle session create/close errors in UI actions
description: Keyboard shortcuts and quick session actions call async APIs without error handling, risking unhandled promise rejections. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Load and resume suspended sessions after refresh
description: Session refresh only fetches status=active, so suspended sessions disappear after reload. Decide whether to load suspended sessions and expose resume UI. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Handle non-ASCII filenames in terminal image paste
description: OSC 1337 encoding uses btoa(file.name), which throws for non-ASCII names and can hang image paste. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Code review: UI stability and API paths
description: Performed code review and documented findings in docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.

title: Frontend: React Context, hooks, and state management
close_reason: Frontend state management created: SessionContext and hooks

close_reason: Fixed in earlier session (see session summary)

close_reason: Terminal server integrated with tmux for session persistence

title: Add missing database indexes for performance
close_reason: Fixed in earlier session (see session summary)

title: N+1 query in folder creation sort order calculation
close_reason: Fixed by replacing getFolders() call with SQL MAX aggregation in createFolder()

close_reason: Implemented Agent Profiles System with database schema, types, service, and API routes

close_reason: Fixed in earlier session (see session summary)

title: Session reordering race condition - wrap in transaction
close_reason: Fixed in earlier session (see session summary)

close_reason: Service layer created: SessionService, TmuxService, GitHubService, WorktreeService

description: Align NewSessionWizard GitHub flow with API contracts (clone/worktree) and internal repository UUID usage. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.

title: Respect auto-follow and pinned active folder settings
description: Session selection currently overrides pinned/auto-follow preferences. Honor autoFollowActiveSession and keep pinned folders stable. See docs/code-review/2025-12-23-code-review.md.
close_reason: Closed

title: Phase 4: API route migration to use cases
close_reason: Migrated suspend/resume routes to use cases with SessionPresenter. Pattern established for remaining routes.

title: Fix SplitContext unstable dependency
description: refreshSplits callback depends on activePanes state, causing recreation on every change. Use functional updater to avoid dependency.

title: Investigate CPU usage without suspending sessions
description: Investigate CPU reductions while keeping sessions connected; avoid idle suspend or auto-detach.

title: Electron Desktop App - Phase 1: Foundation
description:
Create Electron main process with:
- Main process entry point (electron/main/index.ts)
- System tray management (electron/main/tray.ts)
- Process manager to spawn Next.js + Terminal servers (electron/main/process-manager.ts)
- IPC preload script (electron/main/preload.ts)
- Config module (electron/main/config.ts)
- Package.json updates with Electron dependencies
- electron-builder.json5 configuration
- TypeScript config for Electron
close_reason: Completed Phase 1: Created Electron foundation with main process, tray management, process manager, auto-updater, and IPC preload script

title: Electron Desktop App - Phase 6: Packaging
description:
Configure packaging and installers:
- electron-builder.json5 final configuration

- Linux: .deb and .AppImage
- Windows: .exe (NSIS) and .msi
- Code signing configuration (optional)
- Native module rebuild (@electron/rebuild)
- Next.js standalone build integration
close_reason: Phase 6 Packaging complete: electron-builder config verified, icons created (icns/ico/png), standalone Next.js + terminal server bundling, native modules rebuild working

title: Electron Desktop App - Phase 2: Platform Abstraction
description:
Create platform abstraction layer:
- Platform-aware exec wrapper (electron/platform/platform-exec.ts)
- WSL detection and management (electron/platform/wsl-service.ts)
- macOS adapter with Homebrew (electron/platform/adapters/macos.ts)
- Linux adapter with apt/dnf/pacman (electron/platform/adapters/linux.ts)
- Windows/WSL adapter (electron/platform/adapters/windows.ts)
- Path translation utilities (Windows <-> WSL)
- Database schema updates for WSL settings
close_reason: Completed platform abstraction layer with WSL detection, path translation, adapters for macOS/Linux/Windows, and platform-aware execution
